com.ninjaguild.dragoneggdrop.management

Class DEDManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ninjaguild.dragoneggdrop.management.DEDManager

  • public class DEDManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The central manager holding all information regarding world wrappers, loaded dragon templates, and the currently active dragon battle

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DEDManager.RespawnType
      The type of trigger that allowed an Ender Dragon to commence its respawning process

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Construct a new DEDManager object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DEDManager

        public DEDManager(DragonEggDrop plugin)
        Construct a new DEDManager object. This object should mainly be managed by the DragonEggDrop class
        Parameters:
        plugin - an instance of the DragonEggDrop plugin

    • Method Detail

      • registerTemplate

        public void registerTemplate(DragonTemplate template)
        Register a template to the DEDManager in order for it to be used when generating dragons in the respawn process
        Parameters:
        template - the template to register

      • getDragonTemplates

        public java.util.Collection<DragonTemplate> getDragonTemplates()
        Get a collection of all loaded dragon templates
        Returns:
        all dragon templates

      • getRandomTemplate

        public DragonTemplate getRandomTemplate()
        Get a weighted random dragon template pooled from all loaded templates.
        Returns:
        a random dragon template. null if none
        See Also:
        getDragonTemplates()

      • getTemplate

        public DragonTemplate getTemplate(java.lang.String template)
        Get a template based on its identifier (see DragonTemplate.getIdentifier()). This search is case-sensitive.
        Parameters:
        template - the template's unique identifier
        Returns:
        the resulting template, or null if none exists

      • clearTemplates

        public void clearTemplates()
        Clear all loaded dragon templates

      • reloadDragonTemplates

        public void reloadDragonTemplates()
        Load and parse all dragon template files from the "dragons" folder. This method implicitly invokes clearTemplates() before loading any other templates

      • getWorldWrapper

        public EndWorldWrapper getWorldWrapper(org.bukkit.World world)
        Get the world wrapper for the specified world
        Parameters:
        world - the world to get
        Returns:
        the world's respective wrapper

      • getWorldWrappers

        public java.util.Collection<EndWorldWrapper> getWorldWrappers()
        Get the map containing all world wrappers
        Returns:
        all world wrappers

      • clearWorldWrappers

        public void clearWorldWrappers()
        Clear all world wrapper data. This deletes all information to do with active battles, as well as the state of a world according to DragonEggDrop
